javadoc:
Object generated when pointer is over a particular marker in the browser
 navigation bars.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: x
params.comment: x position of the popup point on the screen

params.name: y
params.comment: y position of the popup point on the screen

methods.javadoc:
Returns the address.
@return the address for this marker location
methods.name: getAddr

return.comment: the address for this marker location

methods.javadoc:
Returns the Marker Manager.
@return the marker manager
methods.name: getMarkerManager

methods.javadoc:
Returns the X screen location of the popup point.
@return the X coordinate for the screen location.
methods.name: getX
methods.comment: Returns the X screen location of the popup point.

return.comment: the X coordinate for the screen location.

methods.javadoc:
Returns the Y screen location of the popup point.
@return the Y coordinate for the screen location.
methods.name: getY
methods.comment: Returns the Y screen location of the popup point.

return.comment: the Y coordinate for the screen location.

name: MarkerLocation
comment:
Object generated when pointer is over a particular marker in the browser
 navigation bars.
